    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(Vector3 incDir,
                     Vector3 reflDir,
                     Color outValue)
        Description copied from interface: PhaseFunction
        Evaluate the phase function. Must be reciprocal (invariant to swapping arguments).
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface PhaseFunction
        Parameters:
        incDir - The incident direction
        reflDir - The reflected direction
        outValue - The value of the phase function

      • generate

        public void generate(Vector3 fixedDir,
                     Vector3 outDir,
                     Point2 seed,
                     Color outWeight)
        Description copied from interface: PhaseFunction
        Generate a sample on the hemisphere drawn from a distribution suitable for importance sampling this phase function. The probability density is reported with respect to the solid angle measure.
        Specified by:
        generate in interface PhaseFunction
        Parameters:
        fixedDir - The fixed argument of the phase function
        outDir - The random sample for the variable argument
        seed - 2D random seed used to generate the sample
        outWeight - The weight for an unbiased estimate (value / pdf)

      • pdf

        public double pdf(Vector3 fixedDir,
                  Vector3 dir)
        Description copied from interface: PhaseFunction
        Evaluate the PDF used by generate(), with respect to the solid angle measure.
        Specified by:
        pdf in interface PhaseFunction
        Parameters:
        fixedDir - The fixed argument of the phase function
        dir - The variable argument
        Returns:
        The pdf of generate() choosing dir if given fixedDir
